1.5 MT ADDITIONAL BUNKERS PER DAY DURING BALLAST EXCHANGE

PORT CONSUMPTION:
ABOUT 3.25 MTS IFO OR LSGO +0.10 MGO PER DAY AT PORT (IDLE).
ABOUT 3.75 MTS IFO OR LSGO +0.10 MGO PER DAY AT PORT (WORKING)

BUNKERS SUPPLIED TO BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO-SPECIFICATIONS:
IFO 380CST IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO 8217: 2010 RMG380
MDO IN ACCORDANCE WITH ISO 8217:2010 DMB
(PLEASE SEE BELOW FOR SOUTH AFRICA BUNKERS)
SPEED/CONSUMPTION IN AVERAGE BASED ON GOOD WEATHER CONDITION SMOOTH SEA, NO ADVERSE CURRENTS AND
NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELLS UPTO BEAUFORT SCALE 4 AND OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3(WAVE HEIGHT UPTO 1.25 METER).
VESSEL HAS LIBERTY OF USING MDO/MGO WHEN MANOEUVERING, IN/OUT PORTS, NAVIGATING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED/BUSY/
FOGGY WATERS, CANALS, CHANNELS, RIVERS, BAD WEATHER OR ANY STARTING/STOPPING OF A/E AND MASTER TO ADVISE
CHRTRS TIMELY OF ANY SPEED CHANGE DUE TO A/M REASONS.
ALL ABOUT MEANS AN ALLOWANCE OF 0.5 KNOT ON SPEED AND 5% ON CONSUMPTION,BOTH IN OWRS FAVOR.
THE VESSEL'S PERFORMANCE SHALL ONLY BE ASSESSED ON THE BASIS OF ITS PERFORMANCE IN GOOD WEATHER AS DEFINED IN THIS DESCRIPTION.
ANY PERIOD (AND ANY DISTANCE MADE OR BUNKERS CONSUMED BY THE VESSEL DURING SUCH PERIOD) IN RESPECT OF WHICH
THE VESSEL IS OFF-HIRE OR DURING WHICH THE VESSEL IS DELAYED BY A REDUCTION IN ENGINE SPEED NECESSARY FOR THE SAFE
NAVIGATION OF THE VESSEL IN POOR VISIBILITY, BAD WEATHER OR IN CONGESTED WATERS ARE TO BE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED
FROM THE ASSESSMENT OF BOTH THE VESSEL'S SPEED AND BUNKER CONSUMPTION. ANY TIME PROVEN TO BE LOST SHALL BE SET
OFF AGAINST ANY BUNKERS SAVED (INCL. 5% ALLOWANCE) AND ANY PROVEN BUNKER OVER CONSUMPTION SHALL BE SET OFF
AGAINST ANY TIME SAVED (INCL. 0.5 KNOT ALLOWANCE). WHERE THE VESSEL PERFORMS A BALLAST AND LADEN LEG: ANY OVER
CONSUMPTION IN ONE LEG SHALL BE SET OFF AGAINST ANY BUNKERS AND TIME SAVED (INCL. 5% AND 0.5 KNOT
ALLOWANCES) IN THE OTHER LEG. ANY TIME LOST IN ONE LEG CAN BE SET OFF AGAINST ANY TIME AND BUNKERS SAVED (INCL. 0.5
KNOT AND 5% ALLOWANCE) IN THE OTHER LEG IN A VOYAGE. ALL PERFORMANCES CLAIMS TO BE SETTLED UPON THE COMPLETION OF THE CHARTER.

ALL DETAILS ABOUT 

PLSD TO HEAR.
 
BEST REGARDS,
